Title: Silverlight US Map - Expression Blend Map by Individual US States
Description: This project was created using Expression Blend to as a helper to the US States Map 2.0 in order to break down the use of the map in to individual states.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This project is a Silverlight 4 set of user controls for each state (US Map). The project was created using Expression Blend 4 and XAML. It has no code in the code behind because I wanted to stay true to XAML bindings. I created this project because I needed to be able to manipulate all of the states individually so I needed a starter project with a XAML definition for each state.

You can open the project using Visual Studio 2010 or Expression Blend 4 and the project will run and display properly.

Lastly, the project uses the "Expression Blend 4 Sketch Flow Project." I love using Sketch Flow, it has become my favorite project to prototype in; it beats using PowerPoint if you have the time to learn it.



Please checkout a link to the original project that spawned this projects creation: http://slusmap2.codeplex.com
Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
